verbs.description: [V: hamilton] [ARG1: medical marijuana ban] may have legal issues hamilton city council voted 5 - 1 last year to effectively ban in the city the sale of medical marijuana through its zoning codes and cincinnati attorney mike allen said it may have a legal issue since it will soon be legal in ohio to prescribe medical marijuana in limited forms mike allen hamilton hamilton city council cincinnati marijuana
